verses.roman:
śrīvāsa hāsiyā kahe,-śuna, dāmodara
āmāra lakṣmīra dekha sampatti vistara

synonyms: śrīvāsa—Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura; hāsiyā—smiling; kahe—says; śuna—please hear; dāmodara—O Dāmodara Gosvāmī; āmāra lakṣmīra—of my goddess of fortune; dekha—just see; sampatti vistara—the great opulence.
translation: This time, Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura smiled and told Dāmodara Paṇḍita, "My dear sir, please hear! Just see how opulent my goddess of fortune is!
